about.descripcion:
__Gentío__ is a __digital marketing and communication agency in Córdoba__ created to help brands grow in __revenue__, __online presence__, and __reputation__.

We specialize in __Meta Ads, Google Ads, branding, graphic design, social media management, audiovisual production, and web development__, integrating creativity and data so that every action has a real impact on your business.

We work with SMEs and companies that seek to __position themselves__, __gain visibility on social media__, and __turn followers into clients__.

crecimiento.descripcion: Unleash the potential of your brand with our proven marketing expertise. From strategy to execution, we turn every action into real growth.

estadisticas.impresiones: Monthly impressions across all our brands.
estadisticas.ventas: Average sales increase in our brands.

luco.descripcion: Luco Gourmet achieved its first franchise and experienced a 62.41% growth in followers. It also has over 1 million monthly impressions.

electro.descripcion: In just two months, followers grew by 72.68%, profile visits by +906.96%, and website traffic to view products by +755.56%. Additionally, during this period, we achieved over 100K impressions.

don-nunez.descripcion: Dun Nuñez surpassed 7,400 followers and reached 1 million impressions in less than two months.

tijuca.descripcion: Thanks to our communication strategies, Tijuca has increased its follower base and sales through digital channels and in their office.

secretos.descripcion: Secretos de Campo experienced a 99.69% growth in followers in just three months.

calidad.parrafo1: We can adjust the quantity of deliverables according to each project, but __quality is never up for discussion__.
calidad.parrafo2: Every brand that trusts us also reflects who we are as an agency, which is why we guarantee a constant level of excellence in every piece: from strategy to execution.
calidad.parrafo3: Our commitment is simple: if it __bears the Gentío seal, it has to be up to the standards of the best__.
calidad.video_fallback: Your browser does not support HTML5 videos.

comunicacion.descripcion: We build solid relationships. We communicate your values and strengthen the connection between your brand and its audience.

marketing.descripcion: We turn data into action. We design strategies based on precise analytics that optimize your campaigns and maximize measurable, real results.

grafico.descripcion: Designing to impress. Visual pieces that communicate and leave a lasting impact.

social.descripcion: Strategies that convert. We handle everything from planning to posting to enhance your brand on social media.

paid.descripcion: Maximizing every ad investment. We create optimized campaigns to reach the right audience and make every click impactful.

web.descripcion: We design custom web experiences. Dynamic, functional, and visually appealing sites that turn visitors into clients.

sdr.descripcion: Qualified prospects for your growth. Connecting your business with ideal clients.

fotografia-video.descripcion: We showcase in every production the standard of excellence with which we carry out the communication and marketing of each brand.

footer.realidad: Let's make your vision a reality.

mensaje-whp.mensaje: Hello, I am interested in scheduling a meeting to learn more about your services.

equipo.descripcion: We are professionals dedicated to marketing and creativity. We offer innovative solutions, always focused on delivering results that exceed expectations.

trabaja.title: Do you have a __company__ or a __SME__?
